SQL.LOAD: SELECT exclude_listitem_role_id, role_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, excluded_li_roles_id FROM elp_excluded_li_roles WHERE excluded_li_roles_id = :excluded_li_roles_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT er.role_id, er.exclude_listitem_role_id, er.created_by, er.created_date, er.modified_by, er.modified_date, er.excluded_li_roles_id FROM elp_excluded_li_roles er, elp_exclude_listitem_by_role elibr WHERE er.exclude_listitem_role_id = elibr.exclude_listitem_role_id AND er.exclude_listitem_role_id = :exclude_listitem_role_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_excluded_li_roles SET exclude_listitem_role_id = :exclude_listitem_role_id, role_id = :role_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE excluded_li_roles_id = :excluded_li_roles_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_excluded_li_roles ( exclude_listitem_role_id, role_id, created_by, excluded_li_roles_id ) VALUES ( :exclude_listitem_role_id, :role_id, :created_by, :excluded_li_roles_id )
